cause.description:
I am all about animal rights. I think people like Micheal Vick should pay for their crimes of animal cruelty. I used to believe like everyone else that Peta were the good guys. They wanted to help animals and that was good. That was before I found out their stances on many things.
-Peta is against having animals as pets/companions.
-They pay hundreds of thousands of dollars to arsonists to burn down businesses.
-They KILLED 90% of the pets that they collected from members of the public.
- They have a $26 million budget and yet instead of opening no-kill shelters, they euthenize the animals they pick up.
- They threw the corpses of their animal victims in GARBAGE DUMPSTERS!
-PETA keeps records of how much sodium pentobarbital it takes to kill a puppy, but the group can't keep track of how many dead animals made it back into the company freezer.
-PETA vegetarian campaign coordinator Bruce Friedrich said that “blowing stuff up and smashing windows” is “a great way to bring about animal liberation.”
-One entire PETA website is devoted to the claim-despite ample evidence to the contrary-that Jesus Christ was a vegetarian. PETA protests at houses of worship, even suing a church that tried to protect its members from Sunday-morning harassment. Its billboards taunt Christians with the message that hogs “died for their sins.” PETA insists, contrary to centuries of rabbinical teaching, that the Jewish ritual of kosher slaughter shouldn't be allowed. And its infamous “Holocaust on Your Plate” campaign compares the Jewish victims of Nazi genocide with farm animals.
-PETA has attacked research foundations like the March of Dimes, the Pediatric AIDS Foundation, and the American Cancer Society, because they support animal-based research that might uncover cures for birth defects and life-threatening diseases. PETA president Ingrid Newkirk said that “even if animal research resulted in a cure for AIDS, we would be against it.”
1. Animal rights are extremely important.
2. PETA are murderous hypocrites that kill the animals they are supposedly trying to protect.
3. I want to enlighten others to the truth.
cause.mission: Show people the truth about Peta and their hypocrisy. Also visit www.petakillsanimals.com. They are the ones who enlightened me.
cause.name: People Against Peta
